alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Northern Monterey Bay; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 1:17PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Alameda, northwestern Santa Cruz, central San Mateo, Contra Costa and northwestern Santa Clara Counties through 200 PM PST... At 117 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pittsburg to 15 miles south of Half Moon Bay. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Jose, Oakland, Fremont, Hayward, Sunnyvale, Concord, Santa Clara, Antioch, San Leandro, Livermore, Redwood City, Mountain View, San Ramon, Pleasanton, Union City, Milpitas, Palo Alto, Walnut Creek, Pittsburg and Cupertino. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
